dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, another bit of news coming out of Almaty, Kazakhstan. Sounds like there's been another fire incident.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, another bit of news coming out of Almaty, Kazakhstan. Sounds like there's been another fire incident.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A fire broke out on the territory of the Remizovka gardening cooperative, located in the Bostandyk district of Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? [interrupts] Not again. What's the latest on that, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Not again. What's the latest on that, then?

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it was, like, in the Remizovka gardening cooperative, you know, in the Bostandyk district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Remizovka, okay. And what exactly, uh, was on fire this time?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Remizovka, okay. And what exactly, uh, was on fire this time?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the Almaty Department of Emergency Situations reported it was a residential building. A one-story house, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the Almaty Department of Emergency Situations reported it was a residential building. A one-story house, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the press service of the Almaty Department of Emergency Situations, a residential building was reportedly on fire. "On June 25 at 5:13 p.m., emergency services responded to a fire in the Bostandyk district (Remizovka). A one-story house was burning...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A house. Wow. Do we know how big it was, like, affected?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A house. Wow. Do we know how big it was, like, affected?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're saying preliminarily it's about 80 square meters. That's, um, quite a bit for a single home.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they're saying preliminarily it's about eighty square meters. That's, um, quite a bit for a single home.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...with the affected area preliminarily estimated at 80 square meters," the department reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's a pretty significant area, isn't it? So, what kind of response did it get?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a pretty significant area, isn't it? So, what kind of response did it get?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, quite a substantial one. They had, like, eighteen personnel and three fire trucks dispatched to the scene.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, quite a substantial one. They had, like, eighteen personnel and three fire trucks dispatched to the scene.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Eighteen personnel and three fire trucks were dispatched to the scene.

dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Eighteen personnel? Wow, that's a lot of resources for one house fire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eighteen personnel? Wow, that's a lot of resources for one house fire.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And, uh, it's not the first one recently, either.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And, uh, it's not the first one recently, either.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a fire broke out on June 11 in a barracks-type residential house in Almaty.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right. You're thinking about the other one, aren't you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right. You're thinking about the other one, aren't you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I do. So, two significant residential fires in, like, two weeks in Almaty. Bit concerning, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I do. So, two significant residential fires in, like, two weeks in Almaty. Bit concerning, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.text: It definitely makes you wonder, you know? Hopefully, everyone is okay from this latest one.
